.exit

await nft.mint()

npx hardhat console --network base-sepolia
const nft = await ethers.getContractAt("TestNFT", "0x1234...ABCD");
base-sepolia> 
await nft.mint("ipfs://QmCat");
const nft = await ethers.getContractAt("TestNFT", "0xYourContractAddress");
const nft = await ethers.getContractAt("MyNft", "0xYourContractAddress");
await nft.mint("ipfs://QmDog");   // token #3
await nft.mint("ipfs://QmCat");   // token #2
const nft = await ethers.getContractAt("MyNft", "0xYourContractAddress");
console.log("➡️  Chain ID:", hre.network.config.chainId);
console.log("➡️  RPC URL:", hre.network.config.url);
const hre = require("hardhat");
> process.exit(0);
> console.log("➡️  Chain ID:", hre.network.config.chainId);
> console.log("➡️  RPC URL:", hre.network.config.url);
> const hre = require("hardhat");
